pr_title: DHFPROD-4171: Test and Clear buttons for mapping

timeline.bodyText: What change is causing a String cast to be needed here and in the places below?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Not exactly a change. The OpenApi specs were wrong and had "targetEntity" instead of "targetEntityType". That was hitting the split error since targetEntityType was null. The cast was part of the debugging. I left it since the error "Couldn't find targetEntityType: " more clearly indicated what was wrong than the split undefined error we we seeing.
replies.author: ryanjdew

replies.bodyText: @ryanjdew, some tests are failing with missing ["targetEntityType"] error.
replies.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText: What's an example of a targetEntityType that this is now handling?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: same as above. it was throwing a confusing error when targetEntityType was missing.
replies.author: ryanjdew
